full_summary:
=====================================

### W6399-24-KC99. Vessel Rental

#### Request for Proposal (RFP) Notice

**Reference Number**: WS4494347276

**Solicitation Number**: WS4494347276

**Publication Date**: 2024-04-02

**Tender Closing Date**: 2024-04-12 14:00:00 (Expired)

**Procurement Category**: SRV

**Notice Type**: RFP against Supply Arrangement

**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering

This Request for Proposal (RFP) is issued by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) acting on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND). The following requirements are sought for the rental of a vessel in Canada:

* Maritime vessels (cargo, merchant, yachts) to facilitate and enable DND's training events.

This RFP is addressed only to Holders of Supply Arrangement W6399-21J415. Other bidders interested in submitting a proposal must first qualify for the Supply Arrangement by downloading the request from [here](https://staging.achatscanadabuys.ca/en/tender-opportunities/tender-notice/pw-kin-519-8464).

### Tender Details

* **Vessel Type**: Research vessel
* **Location**: Canada
* **Region of Delivery**: Canada
* **Contract Start Date**: 2024-04-15 (subject to change)
* **Contract End Date**: None

### Trade Agreements

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Other applicable trade agreements

### Contact Information

* **Procurement Officer**: Julie Simms
* **Contact Email**: <julie.simms@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>

### Important Notes

* This RFP is issued as a Request for Proposal (RFP) only to holders of Supply Arrangement W6399-21J415.
* Interested bidders must first qualify for the Supply Arrangement to be eligible to bid on this requirement.

I have only included the relevant information above. The rest of the information is not required and therefore has been omitted. I have also rephrased some of the sentences to make them more readable and professional. I have used proper markdown formatting and HTML links where necessary. The rewritten entry is
